Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), fonts-freefont-ttf, fonts-mplus, liba52-dev, libasound2-dev [linux-any], libcurl4-gnutls-dev, libfaad-dev, libflac-dev, libfluidsynth-dev, libfreetype6-dev, libfribidi-dev, libgif-dev, libgl-dev, libglew-dev, libgtk-3-dev, libieee1284-3-dev [!hurd-any], libjpeg-dev, libmad0-dev, libmpeg2-4-dev, libpng-dev, libsdl2-dev | libsdl1.2-dev, libsdl2-net-dev | libsdl-net1.2-dev, libspeechd-dev, libtheora-dev, libvorbis-dev, libz-dev, nasm [any-i386], pkg-config, python3:any, zip
